name: Wood R (2019) LC GHG Summary Report Kodak i1025, E1035, S2040, S2050, S2060w, S2070, S2080w Scanners
description:
Kodak conducted an ISO 14044 life cycle assessment (LCA) of a line of nearly identical scanners – the KODAK  i1025, E1035, S2040, S2050, S2060w, S2070, S2080w Scanners. The LCA covered the full life cycle - raw materials, manufacturing, packaging, distribution, use, and end of life. LCA objectives were to:
• identify areas of key environmental impact in order to focus improvement efforts,
• meet the imaging equipment EPEAT LCA requirements, and
• evaluate the effectiveness of a previous Streamlined LCA for the same scanner line.
textReference: Life Cycle Assessment Summary Report - Kodak i1025, E1035, S2040, S2050, S2060w, S2070, S2080w Scanners - ISO 14044 Protocol, , June, 2019
